Text:
wasimmalik: Cant you understand the freedom of speech? Are you so brainwashed by your local imam so you cannot think for yourself?

I pitty the fools that are fooled by this repressive and racist religion!

Maybe wasikmmalik can explain to me why if the arabian deity Allah is allmighty and created the infinite cosmos. Why oh why DOES HE/SHE/IT ONLY SPEAK ARABIC? Or is it the language of the hebrew archangel Gabriel/Jibreel.

Question your own faith instead of reacting to an shitty movie, which everybody had regarded as trash if it werent for the obvious reactions of the murderous fanatics of this hateful religion!

That is my opinion! You can KEEP your dictatorship to yourself!
